Frequently Asked Questions

What number bases are supported?

We support binary (base 2), octal (base 8), decimal (base 10), and hexadecimal (base 16).

Is this tool free?

Yes, completely free. No registration required.

Do I need to click a convert button?

No! Just type in any field and all other bases update automatically in real-time.
